runs.comm: good length outside off, Rohit stays in his crease and plays the ball calmly towards point
that ball bounced a bit more from short of a length, hitting the high part of Rohit's bat as he stayed back and ran it down to third man
hits the pad after pitching outside leg on a good length from over the wicket, Dhawan was late on the attempt to turn the ball through square leg
shot! Super timing, stays on the back foot and opens the face to punch the ball through point, he had to room to play that shot and the outfield is really quick
short of a length and straight, Dhawan gets behind the line and defends
banged in short over the off stump, Dhawan stays in his crease and lets the ball pass through to the keeper
a length ball with width outside off, Rohit doesn't try and force it, just opens the face and lets the ball flow off a gentle push off the front foot towards point
jags into the right-hander from a good length outside off, hits Rohit high on the back thigh as he tries to defend

caught at slip! It was a length ball outside off but it did not jag into the right-hander this time, Rohit stayed in his crease and flashed away from his body, not getting close to the ball, the thick edge flew straight to Soumya

shot! Kohli stands tall and moves towards the short of a length ball outside off - unlike Rohit who played away from his body - and slaps it hard through covers, Mahmudullah runs to his right on the boundary and fumbles, but recovers in time to save the four
played with soft hands close on the off side for a single, that was risky
good length on middle and off, Dhawan moves forward and defends

Taskin leaps to his right in his follow through, changing direction and fielding the ball with his arm outstretched above his head, Kohli had driven that hard into the pitch and the ball was bouncing over the bowler before it was intercepted
driven towards deep cover and they run swiftly to come back for the second
good length outside off, Kohli stays back and defends on the off side, Dhawan begins to run but gets sent back
good length angling into the right-hander from just outside off, no room in length or line for Kohli to use, he presses forward and pushes into the leg side
width outside off and Kohli tries to beat the hide off the ball, ends up mis-timing it a touch through cover point
cramps the left-hander for room with a line that aims at the hips from over the wicket, Dhawan tucks it towards square leg for a single to keep the strike
good length on off stump, angling across the left-hander from over the wicket, Dhawan comes forward and plays the ball gently into the covers
steps out of his crease but has nothing to work with, Al-Amin's length and line is tight, Dhawan ends up defending towards the bowler
poor from the fielder at short fine leg, Dhawan glanced the short of a length ball off his hips and Taskin dived to his right over the ball and let it through to the boudnary
pushed off the front foot towards mid-on
moves back and across to a short of a length ball and tucks it behind square leg for a single
mis-times a pull to deep midwicket
edged and four! No slip in place now and Dhawan's poke from the crease goes through the vacant cordon, third man was in the circle too. Great length and the ball seemed to hold its line
a fuller ball on a straighter line, driven firmly towards the bowler and hider dives low and to his right to field, the crowd roars in approval
drives the ball to mid off and Dhawan sets off immediately, tight line and length around off stump from a bowler playing his first game in the tournament, 131 kph that was
that's been driven flat and hard, and just high enough to clear the leaping fielder at mid-off, Kohli made room by moving outside leg and drove the full ball fluently, Hider has his face in his hands
driven to mid off where the fielder is deep in the circle, Kohli sets off right-away and beats the direct hit, the batsman was past the stumps when the ball hit them

edged and four again! There's a slip in place bet it's gone between the keeper and the catcher, Dhawan dabbed at it off the back foot, perhaps looking to steer to third man, but he did not intend to play it so fine
terrific placement! Kohli rocks back to one that isn't too short and pulls the ball into the gap between deep midwicket and long on
driven to long off for a single
that's short and there's width outside off, Dhawan stays back and cuts late, beating short third man to his left, all the pressure is dissipating rapidly
played back to the bowler
steps out and turns the ball off his pads through square leg, the call is for two and they do it easily once the fielder in the deep slips

he's pierced the gap between deep midwicket and deep square leg, huge over in the gap, Dhawan pulls off the back foot, cashing in against the short length from Shakib, who has begun with a really ordinary over
the bounce gets a bit big outside off and Kohli swats it awkwardly towards third man
Mortaza cuts the ball away from Dhawan after pitching on a good length around middle and off, he pokes from his crease and is beaten
stays back and pulls the length ball through square leg, India motor past fifty
Kohli seems to have a mental map of this field, he glances the length ball off his pads, placing it in front of the fielder running to his left from fine leg and diving in vain, the timing is perfect
tucked off the pads behind square to bring up the 50 stand off 32 balls
stays back and taps the good length ball back to the bowler, the crowd cheers the dot
pushed off the front foot, the ball grips the wicket and goes off the outside edge behind point
an appeal for lbw as the ball drifts into the left-hander from around the wicket and hits the pad as Dhawan looks to play on the leg side, possibly sliding down leg
driven on the front foot to long on
driven hard to short cover where Mahmudullah makes a great stop
played to midwicket and they take on the fielder for a risky single! No direct hit at the bowler's end but Kohli would have made it anyway, phew he is fast!
full toss outside off, punched off the front foot towards deep point
makes room by moving outside leg and cuts the length ball through point
jumps back to a good length ball and opens the face so late to run the ball swiftly to third man
that's cleared the backward square leg boundary! Dhawan moves back and towards the off side, gets down on one knee, gets under the length ball and lofts it high and behind square
short of a length on leg and middle, Dhawan stays back and dabs the ball towards short third man
moves back and across again and pushes the ball towards long on for a single
good length on off and middle, played back to the bowler
Nasir slides the ball into the left-hander from around the wicket, Dhawan goes back and tries to play on the leg side but misses and gets hit on the pad
once again Dhawan misses the glance through square leg and plays it towards the bowler
gets down on one knee and sweeps to deep backward square leg
steps out and slightly towards leg and drives smoothly towards long off
steps out of his crease and outside leg, Nasir fires the ball flat and fast outside, Dhawan has to lunge in a hurry to reach the ball and squeeze it through point
a huge appeal for lbw! Kohli tried to play the reverse sweep but it did not come off. If he did not get bat on it, it looked close. the umpire seemed to say bat

Dhawan gets on the front foot, down on one knee, and slogs the ball towards deep midwicket, Sabbir runs in from the midwicket boundary and dives forward to try and catch the ball, the ball falls short and he ends up deflecting it past Taskin, who was running from deep square leg
dabbed past short third man to bring up his half-century! He started shakily but settled down once Kohli came out to bat
played back to the bowler
wide outside off, Dhawan cuts to the fielder on the point boundary
steps out and pushes the ball into the off side for a single
gets on the front foot and carves the ball over the infield at point, Shakib is having an awful game
short ball and Dhawan pulls along the ground but straight to deep square leg
Kohli slogs across the line, hitting the ball in the air towards deep midwicket, Al-Amin runs to his left and dives but the ball falls just short of him and bounces over the rope
a full toss and there's no risk involved here, Kohli stays balanced in his crease and thumps the loose ball to the wide long on boundary
mis-times the ball through midwicket this time for a single

Dhawan gets down low and across in his crease and laps the ball fine of Taskin at short fine leg, Taskin gives chase and dives head first to pull the ball back in, he pushed the boundary skirting back a long way as he dived and taped the ball back into play though. Had he not pushed the boundary back, that would have been four, and it has been given a boundary
driven wide of the bowler running to his right towards long off
hurries Dhawan with the length and line from over the wicket, he was looking to move back and across to pull but the length was not short enough, he hits it to square leg
stays in his crease and turns the length ball through midwicket
nearly in the blockhole, Kohli stays balanced in his crease and drives to long on, he hit it with the bottom of the bat

caught at point! That is a great catch from Soumya! Dhawan moved back and across and opened the face to square drive a full toss, that ball flew off the bat, it travelled low and flat and fast to Soumya's right and he dived quickly to catch it inches off the ground
pulls the ball towards deep midwicket and they race between the wickets for two, Kohli pushed for that run so the throw needed to go to Dhoni's end
stays in his crease and pushes the good length ball towards long on for a single

not many at this rate! Al-amin has given Dhoni the perfect ball to hit, a length ball on off stump, Dhoni planted his foot forward and swung hard, carting the ball miles over midwicket, silencing the crowd
nearly in the blockhole and Dhoni clubs it through midwicket

a full toss, driven hard past the bowler, who skips out of the way, Mahmudullah dives to his right from long off to save the boundary, the man at long on backs up his team-mate but the direct hit at the bowler's end concedes an overthrow
Dhoni is finishing this in style! Lofts the full ball inside out over cover, the ball falls just inside the boundary and goes for four

and that's the winning blow, Al-Amin goes to pieces, bowling a full toss, and Dhoni lofts it cleanly over the midwicket boundary. That ended quicker that expected and the crowd is a subdued one at the moment. India win the Asia Cup for the sixth time
